Package de.unlixx.runpng.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Loc.ChangeListener
    Change listener for changes of the current locale.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ARGB
    Representation of an ARGB-pixel with frequency and a relocation index for palette optimization.
    CompareBitmapsDialog
    Just for testing purposes.
    HashGrouper<K,V>
    An extension of HashMap to group values by a common key type in order to make sort operations by key faster.
    IdTextContainer<V>
    Container to keep a value together with a translatable id-text combination.
    ImageUtil
    Static utility methods to handle bitmaps and image objects.
    LabeledValue<V>
    Container for a immutable label-value combination.
    Loc
    Localization manager.
    LocaleListCell
    Specialized version of ListCell to show the chosen locale in a combo box.
    MenuTool
    MenuTool creates menubars, menus, contextmenus and toolbars from XML resources and icons.
    PivotSorter<T>
    Stack friendly implementation of a pivot sort algorithm.
    Player
    Implementation of a Player derived from the abstract Task class.
    PositiveIntegerFilter
    A filter to apply to text field objects as a ChangeListener.
    Progress<T>
    Progress extends Task in order to incorporate a progress indicator.
    SortedList<T>
    A generic sorted list, which sorts it's elements while adding.
    Tuple<V1,V2>
    A simple typed and immutable tuple.
    Util
    Static utility clas.
    Version
    Immutable version number (major.minor)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ImageUtil.SCALEMODE
    Three possible scale modes for imageScaleCentered.
